message.body: Did you not receive my reply to it?
I did!! I thought you were just talking about receiving it:)
I hope it helped the case you were making
Yes. It did. I used at least 3 points from it. I didn't mention that because I thought it was assumed that it was useful !!!!
Good to know! So, is there a project to change the book? Did you get your new contract?
I don't know anything about what is going to happen with the book. No new contract yet !!
